trans-unit.resname: TFTH·6 | Disorienting Glower | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disorienting Glower
trans-unit.target: Disorienting Glower

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·6 | Disorienting Glower | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Players can't cast spells until the Hydra's next turn.
trans-unit.target: Players can't cast spells until the Hydra's next turn.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·7 | Distract the Hydra | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Distract the Hydra
trans-unit.target: Distract the Hydra

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·7 | Distract the Hydra | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each player may sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way chooses a Head and taps it. Each player who didn't sacrifice a creature loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: Each player may sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way chooses a Head and taps it. Each player who didn't sacrifice a creature loses 3 life.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·8 | Grown from the Stump | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grown from the Stump
trans-unit.target: Grown from the Stump

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·8 | Grown from the Stump | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Place exactly two cards named Hydra Head onto the battlefield from the Hydra's graveyard. If you can't, reveal cards from the top of the Hydra's library until you reveal a Head card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into the Hydra's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Place exactly two cards named Hydra Head onto the battlefield from the Hydra's graveyard. If you can't, reveal cards from the top of the Hydra's library until you reveal a Head card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into the Hydra's graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·9 | Hydra's Impenetrable Hide | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hydra's Impenetrable Hide
trans-unit.target: Hydra's Impenetrable Hide

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·9 | Hydra's Impenetrable Hide | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each Head gains indestructible until the end of the Hydra's next turn.
trans-unit.target: Each Head gains indestructible until the end of the Hydra's next turn.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·10 | Neck Tangle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Neck Tangle
trans-unit.target: Neck Tangle

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·10 | Neck Tangle | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If there are five or more Heads on the battlefield, tap two of them and they don't untap during the Hydra's next untap step. Otherwise, reveal the top card of the Hydra's library and the Hydra casts that card.
trans-unit.target: If there are five or more Heads on the battlefield, tap two of them and they don't untap during the Hydra's next untap step. Otherwise, reveal the top card of the Hydra's library and the Hydra casts that card.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·11 | Noxious Hydra Breath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Noxious Hydra Breath
trans-unit.target: Noxious Hydra Breath

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·11 | Noxious Hydra Breath | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose one — Noxious Hydra Breath deals 5 damage to each player; or destroy each tapped non-Head creature.
trans-unit.target: Choose one — Noxious Hydra Breath deals 5 damage to each player; or destroy each tapped non-Head creature.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·12 | Strike the Weak Spot | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Strike the Weak Spot
trans-unit.target: Strike the Weak Spot

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·12 | Strike the Weak Spot | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy target Head. If that Head was elite, the Hydra takes an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target Head. If that Head was elite, the Hydra takes an extra turn after this one.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·13 | Swallow the Hero Whole | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swallow the Hero Whole
trans-unit.target: Swallow the Hero Whole

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·13 | Swallow the Hero Whole | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each player exiles a creature they control. Until the Hydra's next turn, when a Head leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
trans-unit.target: Each player exiles a creature they control. Until the Hydra's next turn, when a Head leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·14 | Torn Between Heads | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Torn Between Heads
trans-unit.target: Torn Between Heads

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·14 | Torn Between Heads | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tap up to two Heads. They don't untap during the Hydra's next untap step. Torn Between Heads deals 5 damage to each player.
trans-unit.target: Tap up to two Heads. They don't untap during the Hydra's next untap step. Torn Between Heads deals 5 damage to each player.

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·15 | Unified Lunge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unified Lunge
trans-unit.target: Unified Lunge

trans-unit.resname: TFTH·15 | Unified Lunge | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Unified Lunge deals X damage to each player, where X is the number of Heads on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Unified Lunge deals X damage to each player, where X is the number of Heads on the battlefield.
